Name: cottonseed meal to generic market for protein feed | protein feed, 100% crude | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/108:Manufacture of prepared animal feeds/1080:Manufacture of prepared animal feeds
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5998/documentation

This activity is a linking activity, i.e. it connects cottonseed meal with generic protein feed market. Cottonseed meal is used mainly as a feed for animals, thus traded on generic feed market with other protein - containing products.

Cottonseed meal is a by-product from cotton production. This linking activity has the cottonseed meal as input and produces protein and energy feed as output.
